name: GRAVITON (The Pamps Games)
description:
An arcade style game I made in my spare time over two days.

WASD or arrow keys to switch gravity direction.

QEC to engage clutch.

SPACE BAR to Upshift.

Left Shift to Downshift.

Collect green "bosons" to increase your score, and avoid "ionising radiation" to survive!

FINALLY FIXED!
